text: Further, I say this: a covenant confirmed beforehand by God in ChristLess than 3% of the Greek manuscripts, of inferior quality, omit “in Christ” (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.). Without Christ, the Seed, there would have been no promise. The incarnation of Jehovah the Son was in the Plan before the creation of this world (1 Peter 1:19-20). cannot be annulled by the law that came four hundred and thirty years later,Abraham left Haran in 1921 bc, when he was 75.
